name: Hush Baby
description:
Play as the mother of a baby who just doesn't sleep. Tell it stories and keep the baby calm, if it makes a deep growling noise, don't be scared, just rock its crib. "The Spider's Dream" is a great story, but full of lies, change it to fit your truth, or let the story be, like your baby likes it.

If you wake up the baby three times, you lose the game. There's no end.

Music by Prod Jay; Lullaby by Kevin MacLeod
